<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mutant](/Traits.aspx?ID=763)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

The monster has mutated or evolved, granting it unusual benefits, drawbacks, or both.
name: Mutant
